mapper.select: select b.warehouseCode warehouseCode,a.id id,businessName,backImg,a.mapCode storeMapCode, b.mapCode warehouseMapCode from bm_sellermechanism c left join bm_member a on a.id = sellerId left join bm_warehouse b on b.id = c.mechanismId left join sys_employee d on d.warehouseCode = b.warehouseCode where d.tel = #{tel}
